mapper.select: SELECT B.NO, M.NAME WRITER, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.HIT, TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH:MI') AS MODIFY_DATE, NVL(RECOMMEND_CNT, 0) AS CNT, B.DELETE_YN, B.TYPE FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NO, COUNT(M_NO) AS RECOMMEND_CNT FROM BOARD_RECOMMEND GROUP BY NO) R ON B.NO = R.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = B.WRITER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY B.ENROLL_DATE DESC
